sentences.en: I decided to keep my misadventure secret.
sentences.cn: 我打算对这段过错保密.

sentences.en: Our bravest and best lessons are not learned through success, but misadventure.
sentences.cn: 每天进步一点点----最好最妙的教训来自失利而不是成功.

sentences.en: Our bravest and best lessons are not learned through success, but through misadventure.
sentences.cn: 最好最妙的经验教训来自失利而非来自成功.

sentences.en: Our bravest and best lessons are not learnt through success, but through misadventure.
sentences.cn: 最美好的教训不是得之于成功, 而是来之于不幸.

sentences.en: Such corrections are not automatic: something a misadventure in Iran?
sentences.cn: 像这样的自我修正并不是自动的: 有些事情涉险伊朗?

sentences.en: The life of the whole family has changed since the misadventure.
sentences.cn: 这个意外发生之后这个家庭的生活都改变了.
